alert.note: Alert for Chippewa; Swift (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 20 at 11:12PM CDT until June 21 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CHIPPEWA AND WESTERN SWIFT COUNTIES... At 1112 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lake Hassel to Appleton, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 1104 PM, a 60 mph wind gust was measured at Appleton airport. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Benson, Appleton, Milan, Lake Hassel, Clontarf, Hagen, Danvers, Holloway, Benson Airport, Big Bend City and Appleton Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
